quest.name: Ul'dah's Most Wanted
journal: First Sword Mylla requires your immediate assistance with a dangerous matter.
A band of lancers has been slaying Hyuran men bearing swords. Mylla bids you go to Stonesthrow and investigate reports of suspicious foreigners in the area.
Arriving at Stonesthrow, you are ambushed by two Duskwight freelancers, but succeed in vanquishing them both. Speak with the gutless gladiator and ascertain that he is unharmed.
You learn that the freelancers were searching for a man named Aldis. Return to Mylla and inform her of the lancers' demise.

Before you can celebrate your victory, a fellow gladiator named Bruce bursts into the guild and reports that the remaining freelancers are hiding in the tunnel south of Black Brush Station. Mylla bids you and Bruce make a foray into the tunnel and deal with the remaining lancers.
Though your foes were many, they were no match for your excellent swordsmanship. Speak with Bruce and see that he is unharmed.
With the job complete, Bruce takes his leave back to Ul'dah and a celebratory pint. Return to the Gladiators' Guild and report your success to Mylla.

Mylla thanks you for your efforts and admits that she is impressed by your tremendous growth as a gladiator. Before you part ways, she questions you as to the motives of the freelancers. Alas, she is unsatisfied with your response.

※The next gladiator quest will be available from Mylla upon reaching level 15.
objectives: Search for the freelancers in Stonesthrow.
Wait in ambush for the freelancers.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: You look well, Forename. I hope you are ready for your next task, because I require your immediate assistance.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: There have been several violent murders recently, the victims of which were all Hyuran men.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: Based on the multiple spear wounds found upon the bodies of the deceased, we believe that lancers are responsible for the crimes.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: Not only are these murders a blight upon our city, I fear it is only a matter of time before one of our own is targeted.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: I have just received reports of foreign lancers skulking about in Stonesthrow. Considering the circumstances, I find it likely that these are our culprits.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: We cannot abide any more murders. Go to Stonesthrow, outside the Gate of Nald, and speak with any you find in the area. With luck, we may find these lancers before they strike again.

dialogue.name: NPCA
dialogue.text: Don't kill me, please! I'm not the one you want!

dialogue.name: NPCA
dialogue.text: Thank you, thank you! Th–They appeared out of nowhere, asked me if I was Aldis at spearpoint. I said no, but they attacked me anyway! Wh–What did I do to deserve this?

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: So they were indeed the murderers we sought!

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: But what brought Duskwight freelancers all the way from the Black Shroud?

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: And why were they murdering Hyuran men with swords?

dialogue.name: BRUCE
dialogue.text: First Sword!

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: What is it?

dialogue.name: BRUCE
dialogue.text: Lancers, First Sword! A gang of 'em, hidin' in the tunnel south of Black Brush Station!

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: Hmph, it seems we're not rid of them yet. Forename, you might as well finish what you started. Go to central Thanalan and dispatch the last of these freelancers.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: Bruce, accompany Forename. See that shehe doesn't die.

dialogue.name: BRUCE
dialogue.text: Well, I can't keep the lassbloke from gettin' skewered, but I'll patch herhim up best I can.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: Forename, defend Bruce. He knows powerful healing magicks, but he cannot employ them unless you keep all your enemies occupied. Make sure you command their full attention at all times.

dialogue.name: BRUCE
dialogue.text: Aye, I'm countin' on you to keep those bastards away from me. Watch me back and I'll watch yours.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: You have your orders, gladiators! Send these freelancers to the Seventh Gate!

dialogue.name: BRUCE
dialogue.text: Hmmm...seems no one's home. What say we wait here and ambush 'em when they return?

dialogue.name: BRUCE
dialogue.text: Looks like we're done here. Let's head home, Forename─I could use a drink.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: Congratulations on a job well done, Forename. Bruce says you acquitted yourself well. I must say, you have shown tremendous growth since you joined us...

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: I wanted to ask you─Bruce believes the freelancers were out for a bounty. What is your opinion on this, Forename?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: They were tracking a man named Aldis.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Their motives died with them.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: Aldis!? Are you certain that is the name you heard!?

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: He's...he's alive? But how...?

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: I see... Mayhap it is best that we put this sordid affair behind us. Still, I cannot help but wonder...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The next gladiator quest will be available from Mylla upon reaching level 15.

dialogue.name: POP
dialogue.text: You hear several sets of approaching footsteps...

dialogue.name: SCENE00005
dialogue.text:
Duty calls. Do you wish to proceed with
“CLSGLA100”?

dialogue.name: SCENE00005
dialogue.text: Yes

dialogue.name: SCENE00005
dialogue.text: No

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Defeat the Duskwight freelancers!

dialogue.name: GUILDMEMBER
dialogue.text: Hah, bastards're actually makin' me break a sweat!

dialogue.name: GUILDMEMBER
dialogue.text: Ho, looks like someone's pissed in his pease porridge!

dialogue.name: GUILDMEMBER
dialogue.text: Aye, just like that! Keep 'em off me!

dialogue.name: GUILDMEMBER
dialogue.text: Try dodgin' his spear instead of walkin' into it!

dialogue.name: GUILDMEMBER
dialogue.text: Get these bastards off me! If I die, you die!

dialogue.name: GUILDMEMBER
dialogue.text: A bit of help over here, Forename!

dialogue.name: GUILDMEMBER
dialogue.text: Ugh...bloody hells...
